data.title: Matthew McDonough
data.meta_description: Matthew McDonough serves as Managing Director in JLL Parsippany. Read more about this JLL employee and find contact details.
data.text:
Career summary

Matt is a Managing Director in the New Jersey office of JLL Capital Markets, Americas, specializing in tenant representation and landlord disposition services. His corporate representation includes formulating and executing optimal facility strategies, with the goal to provide clients with maximum operational, financial, and contractual benefits. Matt has been involved as owner representative in the development and execution of marketing programs for major commercial properties to retain maximum asset value.

Mattâ€™s tenure exceeds 35 years in New Jersey, allowing clients to benefit from his extensive market knowledge and transaction processes. He has achieved success for his clients over the long term in fluctuating market conditions. His commitment to quality service is evidenced by numerous repeat assignments from satisfied clients.
